nodes.title: chore(deps): update dependency io.projectreactor.netty:reactor-netty to v1.0.4
nodes.body:
[![WhiteSource Renovate](https://app.renovatebot.com/images/banner.svg)](https://renovatebot.com)

This PR contains the following updates:

| Package | Change | Age | Adoption | Passing | Confidence |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| [io.projectreactor.netty:reactor-netty](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty) | `1.0.3` -> `1.0.4` | [![age](https://badges.renovateapi.com/packages/maven/io.projectreactor.netty:reactor-netty/1.0.4/age-slim)](https://docs.renovatebot.com/merge-confidence/) | [![adoption](https://badges.renovateapi.com/packages/maven/io.projectreactor.netty:reactor-netty/1.0.4/adoption-slim)](https://docs.renovatebot.com/merge-confidence/) | [![passing](https://badges.renovateapi.com/packages/maven/io.projectreactor.netty:reactor-netty/1.0.4/compatibility-slim/1.0.3)](https://docs.renovatebot.com/merge-confidence/) | [![confidence](https://badges.renovateapi.com/packages/maven/io.projectreactor.netty:reactor-netty/1.0.4/confidence-slim/1.0.3)](https://docs.renovatebot.com/merge-confidence/) |

---

### Release Notes

<details>
<summary>reactor/reactor-netty</summary>

### [`v1.0.4`](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/releases/v1.0.4)

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/compare/v1.0.3...v1.0.4)

`Reactor Netty` `1.0.4` is part of **`2020.0.4` Release Train**.

This is a recommended update for all `Reactor Netty 1.0.x` users.

##### :sparkles: New features and improvements

-   Depend on `Reactor Core` `v3.4.3`, see [release notes](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/releases/tag/v3.4.3). ([`05304ef`](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/commit/05304efa940e259f5d026676153d3b1b1ebf472b))
-   Depend on `Netty` `v4.1.59.Final`. ([`3b37945`](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/commit/3b3794555b3d81a03fe7f450d4e99feef7b37de3))
-   Expose the response headers via `AccessLogArgProvider`. ([#​1505](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1505), [#​1506](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1506))

##### :beetle: Bug fixes

-   `ServerTransport#childOption` logs `ERROR` only when there is an attempt to set `auto-read=true`. ([#​1466](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1466))
-   Ensure the correct exception is propagated when `HttpClient#uri(Mono.error())`. ([#​1470](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1470))
-   `HttpClient` schedules the first `channel.read()` once the `HttpHeaders` are sent. ([#​421](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/421), [#​1478](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1478), [#​1480](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1480))
-   When `CloseWebSocketFrame` with `-1` status code (undefined/empty), emit `WebSocketCloseStatus.EMPTY`. ([#​1485](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1485), [#​1487](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1487))
-   Ensure `endStream=true` when responding with `500 Internal Server Error` when server in`HTTP/2` mode. ([#​1490](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1490))
-   Do not load `HttpClientSecure` when the protocol is `H2C`. ([#​1491](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1491))
-   Ensure the correct `HttpClientResponse` is created when client request with `Expect: 100-continue` ([#​1482](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1482), [#​1492](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1492))
-   Ensure `PERSISTENT_CHANNEL` and `CONNECTION` attribute keys, can be used in a multi-classloaders context. ([#​1471](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1471), [#​1503](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1503))

##### :book: Documentation, Tests and Build

-   Test the native transport is available when running with `-PforceTransport=native`. ([#​1464](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1464))
-   Test various `HttpClient` configurations that may affect the creation of the connection pool. ([#​1472](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1472), [#​1473](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1473))
-   Add `Lifecycle Callbacks` examples to the reference documentation. ([#​1481](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1481))
-   Add support and deprecation policies to `README` and reference guide. ([#​1483](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1483))
-   Define retry flaky tests functionality for all tasks with type Test. ([`d222ebf`](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/commit/d222ebffa516f6377f5c1f7f9006c159467e3b81))
-   Enforce `NoHTTP` with plugin and relevant exclusions. ([#​1495](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1495))
-   Add `package-info.java` to `reactor.netty.http.brave`. ([`6f171a7`](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/commit/6f171a7951701b37f0e8bf84f1318a18e0df619d))
-   Test that the server selector channel is closed when the server is disposed. ([#​360](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/360), [#​1501](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1501))
-   Update build/test dependencies versions:
    -   `mockito-core` to version `3.7.7`. ([#​1468](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1468))
    -   `assertj-core` to version `3.19.0`. ([#​1476](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1476))
    -   `Apache Tomcat` to version `9.0.43`. ([#​1488](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1488))
    -   `junit` to version `5.7.1`. ([#​1493](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1493))
    -   `junit-platform-launcher` to version `1.7.1`. ([#​1494](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1494))
    -   `com.google.osdetector` to version `1.7.0`. ([#​1504](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1504))
    -   `netty-tcnative-boringssl-static` to version `2.0.36.Final`. ([`3b37945`](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/commit/3b3794555b3d81a03fe7f450d4e99feef7b37de3))
    -   `netty-incubator-transport-native-io_uring` to version `0.0.4.Final`. ([#​1507](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-netty/issues/1507))

##### :+1: Thanks to the following contributors that also participated to this release

[@​k631583871](https://togithub.com/k631583871), [@​leleueri](https://togithub.com/leleueri), [@​limaoning](https://togithub.com/limaoning)

</details>

---

### Renovate configuration

:date: **Schedule**: At any time (no schedule defined).

:vertical_traffic_light: **Automerge**: Disabled by config. Please merge this manually once you are satisfied.

:recycle: **Rebasing**: Whenever PR is behind base branch, or you tick the rebase/retry checkbox.

:no_bell: **Ignore**: Close this PR and you won't be reminded about this update again.

---

 - [ ] <!-- rebase-check -->If you want to rebase/retry this PR, check this box

nodes.title: chore(deps): update dependency io.projectreactor:reactor-core to v3.4.3
nodes.body:
[![WhiteSource Renovate](https://app.renovatebot.com/images/banner.svg)](https://renovatebot.com)

This PR contains the following updates:

| Package | Change | Age | Adoption | Passing | Confidence |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| [io.projectreactor:reactor-core](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core) | `3.4.2` -> `3.4.3` | [![age](https://badges.renovateapi.com/packages/maven/io.projectreactor:reactor-core/3.4.3/age-slim)](https://docs.renovatebot.com/merge-confidence/) | [![adoption](https://badges.renovateapi.com/packages/maven/io.projectreactor:reactor-core/3.4.3/adoption-slim)](https://docs.renovatebot.com/merge-confidence/) | [![passing](https://badges.renovateapi.com/packages/maven/io.projectreactor:reactor-core/3.4.3/compatibility-slim/3.4.2)](https://docs.renovatebot.com/merge-confidence/) | [![confidence](https://badges.renovateapi.com/packages/maven/io.projectreactor:reactor-core/3.4.3/confidence-slim/3.4.2)](https://docs.renovatebot.com/merge-confidence/) |

---

### Release Notes

<details>
<summary>reactor/reactor-core</summary>

### [`v3.4.3`](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/releases/v3.4.3)

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/compare/v3.4.2...v3.4.3)

Reactor-Core `3.4.3` is part of **`2020.0.4` release train (Europium SR4)**.

This is a maintenance release which also inherit changes from [`3.3.14.RELEASE`](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/releases/tag/v3.3.4.RELEASE).

#### :sparkles: New features and improvements

-   Provide a reworked FluxSwitchMap with no queue, allows `switchMap`/`switchOnNext` with prefetch=0 ([#​2596](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/issues/2596))
-   from 3.3.14.RELEASE:
    -   fix [#​2569](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/issues/2569) Enrich message of elementAt's IndexOutOfBoundsException 
    -   Add hook to wrap Queues ([#​2566](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/issues/2566)) 

#### :beetle: Bug fixes

-   Protect against sparse array on subscribe ([#​2557](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/issues/2557))
-   Rework how stepName() is computed ([#​2551](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/issues/2551))  
-   Reorder repeatWhen onComplete request vs signalling ([#​2579](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/issues/2579))
-   from 3.3.14.RELEASE:
    -   Metrics should prioritize closest tag in case of duplicates  ([#​2560](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/issues/2560))
    -   Rework how stepName() is computed (backport [#​2551](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/issues/2551) in 3.3.14.RELEASE)
    -   `skipUntil` conditional subscriber logic inconsistent ([#​2578](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/issues/2578))
    -   Fix OverflowException in MultiSubscriptionSubscriber, notably affecting `concatMap` ([#​2576](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/issues/2576))

#### :book: Documentation, Tests and Build

-   [reactor-test] Let `TestLogger` be configured with simplified format ([#​2538](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/issues/2538))
-   [doc] Format Consumer<Subscription> in backpressure doc ([#​2590](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/issues/2590))
-   from 3.3.14.RELEASE:
    -   Fix some metrics tests to avoid implicit use of globalRegistry ([#​2575](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/issues/2575))
    -   [build] Enforce NoHTTP with plugin and relevant exclusions ([#​2574](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/issues/2574))
    -   [build] Document the Java 8/9 stubs in Core's build file ([#​2573](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/issues/2573)) 
    -   Fix a few return types in Mono javadocs ([#​2581](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/issues/2581))
    -   Amend SerializedSubscriberTest to accept rare double discard ([#​2592](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/issues/2592))
    -   Improve explanations in Retry javadoc ([#​2609](https://togithub.com/reactor/reactor-core/issues/2609))

#### :+1: Thanks to the following contributors that also participated to this release

[@​richardfearn](https://togithub.com/richardfearn), [@​vdjuketic](https://togithub.com/vdjuketic)

</details>

---

### Renovate configuration

This PR contains the following updates:
